General.Name: Sichuan Expressway Company Limited
General.Description: Sichuan Expressway Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the investment, construction, operation, and management of expressway infrastructure projects in Sichuan Province, the People's Republic of China. It operates through six segments: Expressway, New Energy Technologies, Transportation Services, Transportation Logistics, Construction Services, and Others. The Expressways segment is involved in the operation of expressways and a high-grade toll bridge. The New Energy Technologies segment provides charging services for electric vehicles. The Transportation Services segment engages in the provision of advertising services; rental of properties and expressways; operation of gas stations and expressways; and sale of oil products. The Transportation Logistics segment is involved in the bulk commodity logistics trade business. The Construction Services segment engages in the provision of construction and upgrade services under the service concession arrangements and construction contracts. The Others segment is involved in the financial investment. Sichuan Expressway Company Limited was incorporated in 1997 and is based in Chengdu, the People's Republic of China.

2.Name: Mr. Guo  Renrong
2.Title: CFO, Financial Controller & Acting Sec. of the Board
